has_mention.description: Whether there is any mention of this variable in the text.
has_mention.title: Has Mention

spans.description: The text spans where this variable is mentioned.
spans.title: Spans

status.description: What is the status of this medication?

category.description: In which healthcare setting is this medication prescribed/administered?

route.description: What is the the route of administration for this medication?

phase.description: What is the treatment phase for this medication?

expected_supply_days.description: Number of days the medication supply is supposed to last (stale dating the prescription)
expected_supply_days.title: Expected Supply Days

number_of_repeats_allowed.description: number of times (aka refills or repeats) that the patient can receive the prescribed medication
number_of_repeats_allowed.title: Number Of Repeats Allowed

frequency.description: What is the frequency of this medication?

start_date.description: Start date of the prescribed or administered medication
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: End date of the prescribed or administered medication
end_date.title: End Date

quantity_value.description: Numeric amount of medication prescribed or administered (FHIR Quantity.value)
quantity_value.title: Quantity Value

drug_class.description: Extract the Immunosuppressive drug class or therapy modality class or therapy modality documented for this medication, if present

ingredient.description: Extract the Specific immunosuppressive drug ingredient ingredient documented for this medication, if present

enum: Medication ordered/administered during an inpatient/acute care setting
Medication ordered/administered during an outpatient setting
Medication ordered/consumed by the patient in their home (including long term care, nursing homes, etc)
RxCategory.title: RxCategory

RxRoute.description:
Route of Administration can "help" (but not deterministic) for drug metadata, examples
* Injection --> antibody for induction/rescue therapy
* Topical --> skin lesions
* Inhalation --> Steroid
https://build.fhir.org/valueset-route-codes.html
RxRoute.title: RxRoute

RxStatus.description:
Medication Status (including Intent because chart review is NOT always identical to Med Request)
https://build.fhir.org/valueset-medicationrequest-status.html
https://build.fhir.org/valueset-medicationrequest-intent.html
enum: Medication order is active (currently prescribed and intended for ongoing use).
Medication is planned/ordered/prescribed but therapy has not yet started.
Medication course is finished (all doses given or intended duration completed).
Medication was stopped or permanently discontinued before completion.
Medication order was canceled/withdrawn before any doses were administered.
Medication is temporarily paused (on-hold, suspended, or interrupted).
RxStatus.title: RxStatus
